stem.svg&filetimestamp=20170324054625&) [Create a local coordinate system](/PartDesign_CoordinateSystem "PartDesign CoordinateSystem"): creates a local coordinate system attached to datum geometry in the active body. (1.0 and below)

    [introduced in 1.1](/Release_notes_1.1 "Release notes 1.1"): these tools have been replaced by new [datum tools](/Std_Base#Part_Datums "Std Base").

### Part Design Modeling tools[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=4 "Edit section: Part Design Modeling tools") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=4 "Edit section's source code: Part Design Modeling tools")]

#### Additive tools[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=5 "Edit section: Additive tools") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=5 "Edit section's source code: Additive tools")]

These are tools for creating base features or adding material to an existing body. 

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Pad.svg&filetimestamp=20240522201513&) [Pad](/PartDesign_Pad "PartDesign Pad"): extrudes a solid from a selected sketch.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Revolution.svg&filetimestamp=20170324054918&) [Revolution](/PartDesign_Revolution "PartDesign Revolution"): creates a solid by revolving a sketch around an axis. The sketch must form a closed profile.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveLoft.svg&filetimestamp=20200118062952&) [Additive loft](/PartDesign_AdditiveLoft "PartDesign AdditiveLoft"): creates a solid by making a transition between two or more sketches.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditivePipe.svg&filetimestamp=20200326013518&) [Additive pipe](/PartDesign_AdditivePipe "PartDesign AdditivePipe"): creates a solid by sweeping one or more sketches along an open or closed path.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveHelix.svg&filetimestamp=20210205035955&) [Additive helix](/PartDesign_AdditiveHelix "PartDesign AdditiveHelix"): creates a solid by sweeping a sketch along a helix.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveBox.svg&filetimestamp=20191206231922&)[](/index.php?title=File:Toolbar_flyout_arrow_blue_background.svg&filetimestamp=20221006081506&) Create an additive primitive:

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveBox.svg&filetimestamp=20191206231922&) [Additive box](/PartDesign_AdditiveBox "PartDesign AdditiveBox"): creates an additive box.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveCylinder.svg&filetimestamp=20191211225841&) [Additive cylinder](/PartDesign_AdditiveCylinder "PartDesign AdditiveCylinder"): creates an additive cylinder.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveSphere.svg&filetimestamp=20191211230315&) [Additive sphere](/PartDesign_AdditiveSphere "PartDesign AdditiveSphere"): creates an additive sphere.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveCone.svg&filetimestamp=20191211225758&) [Additive cone](/PartDesign_AdditiveCone "PartDesign AdditiveCone"): creates an additive cone.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveEllipsoid.svg&filetimestamp=20191211225913&) [Additive ellipsoid](/PartDesign_AdditiveEllipsoid "PartDesign AdditiveEllipsoid"): creates an additive ellipsoid.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveTorus.svg&filetimestamp=20191211230318&) [Additive torus](/PartDesign_AdditiveTorus "PartDesign AdditiveTorus"): creates an additive torus.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditivePrism.svg&filetimestamp=20191211230050&) [Additive prism](/PartDesign_AdditivePrism "PartDesign AdditivePrism"): creates an additive prism.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_AdditiveWedge.svg&filetimestamp=20191211230344&) [Additive wedge](/PartDesign_AdditiveWedge "PartDesign AdditiveWedge"): creates an additive wedge.

#### Subtractive tools[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=6 "Edit section: Subtractive tools") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=6 "Edit section's source code: Subtractive tools")]

These are tools for subtracting material from an existing body. 

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Pocket.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053209&) [Pocket](/PartDesign_Pocket "PartDesign Pocket"): creates a pocket from a selected sketch.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Hole.svg&filetimestamp=20240405093159&) [Hole](/PartDesign_Hole "PartDesign Hole"): creates a hole feature from a selected sketch. The sketch must contain one or multiple circles.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Groove.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053310&) [Groove](/PartDesign_Groove "PartDesign Groove"): creates a groove by revolving a sketch around an axis.

  * [](/index.php?t

title: PartDesign Workbench
text:
:PartDesign_Hole.svg&filetimestamp=20240405093159&) [Hole](/PartDesign_Hole "PartDesign Hole"): creates a hole feature from a selected sketch. The sketch must contain one or multiple circles.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Groove.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053310&) [Groove](/PartDesign_Groove "PartDesign Groove"): creates a groove by revolving a sketch around an axis.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveLoft.svg&filetimestamp=20200917234122&) [Subtractive loft](/PartDesign_SubtractiveLoft "PartDesign SubtractiveLoft"): creates a solid shape by making a transition between two or more sketches and subtracts it from the active body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractivePipe.svg&filetimestamp=20200917233608&) [Subtractive pipe](/PartDesign_SubtractivePipe "PartDesign SubtractivePipe"): creates a solid shape by sweeping one or more sketches along an open or closed path and subtracts it from the active body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveHelix.svg&filetimestamp=20210205040332&) [Subtractive helix](/PartDesign_SubtractiveHelix "PartDesign SubtractiveHelix"): creates a solid shape by sweeping a sketch along a helix and subtracts it from the active body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveBox.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064103&)[](/index.php?title=File:Toolbar_flyout_arrow_blue_background.svg&filetimestamp=20221006081506&) Create a subtractive primitive:

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveBox.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064103&) [Subtractive box](/PartDesign_SubtractiveBox "PartDesign SubtractiveBox"): adds a subtractive box to the active body.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveCylinder.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064220&) [Subtractive cylinder](/PartDesign_SubtractiveCylinder "PartDesign SubtractiveCylinder"): adds a subtractive cylinder to the active body.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveSphere.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064432&) [Subtractive sphere](/PartDesign_SubtractiveSphere "PartDesign SubtractiveSphere"): adds a subtractive sphere to the active body.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveCone.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064139&) [Subtractive cone](/PartDesign_SubtractiveCone "PartDesign SubtractiveCone"): adds a subtractive cone to the active body.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveEllipsoid.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064314&) [Subtractive ellipsoid](/PartDesign_SubtractiveEllipsoid "PartDesign SubtractiveEllipsoid"): adds a subtractive ellipsoid to the active body.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveTorus.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064503&) [Subtractive torus](/PartDesign_SubtractiveTorus "PartDesign SubtractiveTorus"): adds a subtractive torus to the active body.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractivePrism.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064358&) [Subtractive prism](/PartDesign_SubtractivePrism "PartDesign SubtractivePrism"): adds a subtractive prism to the active body.

    

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_SubtractiveWedge.svg&filetimestamp=20191212064536&) ‎[Subtractive wedge](/PartDesign_SubtractiveWedge "PartDesign SubtractiveWedge"): adds a subtractive wedge to the active body.

#### Boolean[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=7 "Edit section: Boolean") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=7 "Edit section's source code: Boolean")]

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Boolean.svg&filetimestamp=20170324054605&) [Boolean operation](/PartDesign_Boolean "PartDesign Boolean"): imports one or more Bodies or PartDesign Clones into the active body and applies a Boolean operation.

### Dress-up tools[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=8 "Edit section: Dress-up tools") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=8 "Edit section's source code: Dress-up tools")]

These tools apply a treatment to edges or faces. 

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Fillet.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053340&) [Fillet](/PartDesign_Fillet "PartDesign Fillet"): fillets (rounds) edges of the active body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Chamfer.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053411&) [Chamfer](/PartDesign_Chamfer "PartDesign Chamfer"): chamfers edges of the active body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Draft.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053440&) [Draft](/PartDesign_Draft "PartDesign Draft"): applies an angular draft to selected faces of the active body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Thickness.svg&filetimestamp=20170324055310&) [Thickness](/PartDesign_Thickness "PartDesign Thickness"): creates a thick shell from the active body and opens selected face.

### Tra

title: PartDesign Workbench
text:
x.php?title=File:PartDesign_Draft.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053440&) [Draft](/PartDesign_Draft "PartDesign Draft"): applies an angular draft to selected faces of the active body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Thickness.svg&filetimestamp=20170324055310&) [Thickness](/PartDesign_Thickness "PartDesign Thickness"): creates a thick shell from the active body and opens selected face.

### Transformation tools[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=9 "Edit section: Transformation tools") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=9 "Edit section's source code: Transformation tools")]

These are tools for transforming existing features. 

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Mirrored.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053615&) [Mirrored](/PartDesign_Mirrored "PartDesign Mirrored"): mirrors one or more features.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_LinearPattern.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053639&) [Linear Pattern](/PartDesign_LinearPattern "PartDesign LinearPattern"): creates a linear pattern of one or more features.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_PolarPattern.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053715&) [Polar Pattern](/PartDesign_PolarPattern "PartDesign PolarPattern"): creates a polar pattern of one or more features.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_MultiTransform.svg&filetimestamp=20170324053740&) [Create MultiTransform](/PartDesign_MultiTransform "PartDesign MultiTransform"): creates a pattern by combining any of the transformations mentioned above, as well as the [Scaled](/PartDesign_Scaled "PartDesign Scaled") transformation. 
    * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Scaled.svg&filetimestamp=20180131171729&) [Scaled](/PartDesign_Scaled "PartDesign Scaled"): scales one or more features. This is not available as a separate transformation tool.

#### Extras[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=10 "Edit section: Extras") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=10 "Edit section's source code: Extras")]

Some additional functionality found in the Part Design menu: 

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_Sprocket.svg&filetimestamp=20240405092958&) [Sprocket](/PartDesign_Sprocket "PartDesign Sprocket"): creates a sprocket profile that can be padded.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_InvoluteGear.svg&filetimestamp=20240405093112&) [Involute gear](/PartDesign_InvoluteGear "PartDesign InvoluteGear"): creates an involute gear profile that can be padded.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_WizardShaft.svg&filetimestamp=20240528082352&) [Shaft design wizard](/PartDesign_WizardShaft "PartDesign WizardShaft"): Generates a shaft from a table of values and allows to analyze forces and moments. The shaft is made with a revolved sketch that can be edited.

### Context Menu items[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=11 "Edit section: Context Menu items") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=11 "Edit section's source code: Context Menu items")]

  * [Suppressed](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Suppressed&action=edit&redlink=1 "PartDesign Suppressed \(page does not exist\)"): checkbox to disable a specific feature without deleting it. [introduced in 1.0](/Release_notes_1.0 "Release notes 1.0")

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_MoveTip.svg&filetimestamp=20240405093058&) [Set tip](/PartDesign_MoveTip "PartDesign MoveTip"): redefines the tip, which is the feature exposed outside of the Body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_MoveFeature.svg&filetimestamp=20240405093125&) [Move object to other body](/PartDesign_MoveFeature "PartDesign MoveFeature"): moves the selected sketch, datum geometry or feature to another Body.

  * [](/index.php?title=File:PartDesign_MoveFeatureInTree.svg&filetimestamp=20210122023739&) [Move object after other object](/PartDesign_MoveFeatureInTree "PartDesign MoveFeatureInTree"): allows reordering of the Body tree by moving the selected sketch, datum geometry or feature to another position in the list of features.

#### Items shared with the Part workbench[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=12 "Edit section: Items shared with the Part workbench") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=12 "Edit section's source code: Items shared with the Part workbench")]

  * [](/index.php?title=File:Std_SetAppearance.svg&filetimestamp=20240411193735&) [Appearance](/Std_SetAppearance "Std SetAppearance"): determines appearance of the whole part (color transparency etc.).

  * [](/index.php?title=File:Part_ColorPerFace.svg&filetimestamp=20240413174244&) [Color per face](/Part_ColorPerFace "Part ColorPerFace"): Assigns colors to individual

### Obsolete tools[[edit](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&veaction=edit&section=13 "Edit section: Obsolete tools") | [edit source](/index.php?title=PartDesign_Workbench&action=edit&section=13 "Edit section's source code: Obsolete tools")]
